item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 12, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:

10. Qubit Transistors Reach Error Correction Benchmark (8 points | discuss)
11. Large-Scale Generation of Transit Maps from OpenStreetMap Data (185 points | 22 comments)

20. We spent $20 to achieve RCE and accidentally became the admins of .mobi (1437 points | 332 comments)
21. Show HN: Build Your WSL Distro in Docker (6 points | 1 comment)

24. Why Oxide Chose Illumos (122 points | 62 comments)

27. Transparenttextures.com (265 points | 34 comments)

29. The Minneapolis Street Grid: Explained (100 points | 40 comments)
